function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Insufficient ventilation leading to poor air quality and potential disease spread.","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne disease transmission and compromised health of occupants.","Mitigation":"Implement proper ventilation systems, use air cleaners with HEPA filters, and increase outdoor air in air-conditioning systems.","Technologies":"HEPA filters, outdoor air systems, air cleaners.","People":"Occupants, building occupants, public health.","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, public health authorities."},{"Description":"Use of ineffective or inappropriate filtration and cleaning methods in HVAC systems.","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne disease transmission and compromised health of occupants.","Mitigation":"Regular cleaning and replacement of HVAC filters, avoidance of chemical disinfection, and proper operation of indoor air cleaners.","Technologies":"HVAC filters, indoor air cleaners.","People":"Occupants, building occupants, public health.","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, public health authorities."},{"Description":"Inadequate heat recovery equipment leading to improper air pressure differentials and ventilation.","Impact":"Inefficient ventilation and potential spread of airborne contaminants.","Mitigation":"Proper maintenance and operation of heat recovery equipment, avoidance of rotary heat exchangers, and monitoring of pressure differentials between zones.","Technologies":"Heat recovery equipment, pressure sensors.","People":"Occupants, building occupants, public health.","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, public health authorities."}]}
